CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 27, 1962, pg. 27 reads: "State Congress Faculty - The faculty [sic] of the Pennsylvania Baptist Congress of Christian Education, one of the largest in country, is seen here at the close of a faculty meeting in Pittsburgh at Sixth Mt. Zion Baptist Church. Left to right: Mrs. J.S. Brack, Mrs. Hazel B. Nelson, dean of the Eastern District; W.A. Arvan, state dean; Mrs. Edyth W. Jamison, secretary of the Faculty Club; W.M. Stockton, president of the Faculty Club; Mrs. C.E.McFadden, good cheer secretary; D.A. Delaver, assistant state dean, and the Rev. Nathaniel Croston, president of the Eastern District.  Second row: Marshall Murray, Mrs. Sara Holley, Dr. J.R. Coster, Mrs. Inez W. Brown, the Rev. Clarence Eaton, Mrs. Gladys McNairy, the Rev. W.R. Harris, Mrs. Z. Scroggins, Mrs. E.L. Roberts, the Rev. H.H. Gaines, Mrs. Kathryn H. Johnson, the Rev. E.L. Roberts and Mrs. B.R. Hairston.  Third row: Mrs. Edna J. Washington, the Revs. J.E. Washington, F.L. Henley, J.A. Cox and S.L. Spear.  Back row: The Rev. T.J. McGhee, Benjamin Moore, the Rev. F.B. Hill, the Rev. J.B. Williams, Mrs. Mildred Gaines and the Rev. A.M. Waller.  The identity of a few persons in the group was unknown to the writer."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women and men seated in pews in Sixth Mt. Zion Baptist Church for faculty meeting of the Pennsylvania Baptist Congress of Christian Education
